item.title: EKS Cluster deployment
item.description: Setting Up Your Environment Variables Starting with setting up your environment variables is the most efficient approach. Please adjust these variables based on your specific AWS region: export AWS_REGION=us-west-2 export EKS_VERSION=1.29 export CLUSTER_NAME=solo-io-gloo-mesh-workshop NUMBER_NODES=3 # Choose from compatible options - for example, the compute-optimized family with 8 vCPUs and 16.0 GiB of memory NODE_TYPE="c7i.xlarge" Deploy Your Cluster with eksctl Use the following eksctl command to create your cluster.
